repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Manuscript is some unknown commentary on the Vālmiki-Rāmāyaṇa. It ends abruptly. It begins with the 56th chapter of the second kāṇḍa of Rāmāyaṇa. One half broken blank folio at the end. Some lines are written in Tamil script . Tamil Characters such as ṉa, pa etc are frequently seen. First 9 folio are missing.

msItem.title: Rāmāyaṇa-vyākhyā
msItem.incipit: 10v 1 kausalyā vākyaṃ . vanavāsāya rāmasya pañcarātro 'dya gaṇyate yaḥ śokahataharṣāyāḥ pañcavarṣopamo mameti pañcarātro gaṇyate ityanena pañcarātraṃ yā gatāḥ . idānīṃ 10v 2 ṣaṣṭho divasaḥ ityarthaḥ . tathoktaṃ sa rājā one deleted syllable rajaniṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme vrajane vanaṃ [gap of 2 syllables due to damaged folio,] tre daśarathaḥ saṃsmaran durjanakṛtamiti tadānimavarājño lokāntaraprā 10v 3 ptiḥ . tayānidīnaṃ kathayannarādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanau taraḥ ? gaterdha rātre ? śaduḥ
msItem.explicit:
70v 1 hārañca athāha bhogaṃ karmabhuñjī? ktaṃ sujīśca prakāśakasvasrūpasya? vāsa? ? mihaviṭahe jayine ? tāṃ patrayācanaṃ harṇatīha (approximately 5 syllables are not legible.) One blank folio after 70v.
71v 1 śrīmānveṃkaṭanāthāryaḥ .hṛdi . trio?ñca tvāgniśakti naravarrtatad…. 71v 8 omaṭicārga? ṇu eva tadā sugomaṭhatigoma? (approximately 5 syllables are not legible.) tatārha natvota? ……. vā

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Question mark is used to show doubtful syllable. Space is added to separate words.
